```{r}

# Download the packages from Bioconductor
BiocManager::install(c("flowWorkspace", "flowCore", "PeacoQC", "FlowSOM"))

# Attach packages
library(flowWorkspace,flowCore,PeacoQC,FlowSOM)

# Install "remotes" package for getting github packages, and install Autospectral
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("DrCytometer/AutoSpectral")

# Attach "Autospectral"
library(AutoSpectral)

#Confirm that all the packages are attached
sessionInfo()
```
